(:action create ; Create a resource or state change
    :parameters (?entity - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at ?entity ?location)
                    (available ?resource ?location)
                    (not (created ?resource ?location))
                  )
    :effect (and
              (created ?resource ?location)
              (not (available ?resource ?location))

(:action light ; Light a resource and update its state
:parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - flammable)
:precondition (and (spark_created ?resource) (not (lit ?resource)))
:effect (lit ?resource))

(:action scavenge ; Scavenge resources and update task status
    :parameters (?agent - person ?location - area ?resource - resource_type)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (available ?resource ?location)
                  )
    :effect (and
              (collected ?agent ?resource)
              (not (available ?resource ?location))
